attributes.action: Ticketmaster shouldn't be allowed to resell tickets on it's partner website
attributes.additional_details: I myself applied for tickets at 09:00 on 23/01/17 when tickets went on general sale sand was instantly told no tickets were available and was directed to a partner resale website when the same tickets I had applied for were now being sold at massively over inflated prices.
attributes.background: U2 tickets were on sale on Ticketmasters partner resell website at over inflated prices, a minute after they went on general sale. This is not the first time they have done this. It is blatant ticket touting and rips off the fans. They should not be able to do this but there is no law to stop them.
